verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* unto me all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w*, whatsoever \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w womb|strong="H7358"\w* among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add both\add* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: it \add is\add* mine.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, in which ye came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*; for by \w strength|strong="H2392"\w* of \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought you \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from this \add place:\add* there shall no leavened \w bread|strong="H2557"\w* be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*.\f + \fr 13.3 \ft bondage: Heb. servants\f*
This \w day|strong="H3117"\w* came ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* in the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Abib|strong="H0024"\w*.

¶ And it shall be when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, and the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, and the \w Hivites|strong="H2340"\w*, and the \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, which he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* with \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, that thou shalt \w keep|strong="H5647"\w* this \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in this \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

\w Seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*, and in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* shall be \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; and there shall no leavened \w bread|strong="H2557"\w* be \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* with thee, neither shall there be \w leaven|strong="H7603"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* with thee in all thy \w quarters|strong="H1366"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w shew|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \add This is done\add* because \w of|strong="H5668"\w* \w that|strong="H2088"\w* \add which\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto me when I came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And it shall be for a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* unto thee upon thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* between thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, that the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* may be in thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*: for with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* brought thee \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
Thou shalt therefore \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* this \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* in his \w season|strong="H4150"\w* from \w year|strong="H3117"\w* to \w year|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ And it shall be when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* thee into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, as he \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thee and to thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it thee,

That thou shalt set \w apart|strong="H5674"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w matrix|strong="H7358"\w*, and every \w firstling|strong="H6363"\w* that \w cometh|strong="H7698"\w* of a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* which thou hast; the \w males|strong="H2145"\w* \add shall be\add* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 13.12  t set…: Heb. cause to pass over *

And every \w firstling|strong="H6363"\w* of an \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* thou shalt \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* with a \w lamb|strong="H7716"\w*; and if thou wilt not \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w* it, then thou shalt break his \w neck|strong="H6202"\w*: and all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* among thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* shalt thou \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*.\f + \fr 13.13 \ft lamb: or, kid\f*

¶ And it shall be when thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w asketh|strong="H7592"\w* thee in time to \w come|strong="H4279"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add is\add* this? that thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, By \w strength|strong="H2392"\w* of \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought us \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w bondage|strong="H5650"\w*:\f + \fr 13.14 \ft in…: Heb. to morrow\f*

And it came to pass, when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* would \w hardly|strong="H7185"\w* let us \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, both the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, and the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: therefore I \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w matrix|strong="H7358"\w*, being \w males|strong="H2145"\w*; but all the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of my \w children|strong="H1121"\w* I \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*.

And it shall be for a \w token|strong="H0226"\w* upon thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and for \w frontlets|strong="H2903"\w* between thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: for by \w strength|strong="H2392"\w* of \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* brought us \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* had let the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w led|strong="H5148"\w* them not \add through\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w although|strong="H3588"\w* that \add was\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*; for \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Lest peradventure the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* when they \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, and they \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*:

But \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w led|strong="H5437"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, \add through\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*: and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w harnessed|strong="H2571"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 13.18 \ft harnessed: or, by five in a rank\f*

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* with him: for he had \w straitly|strong="H7650"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w surely|strong="H6485"\w* \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* you; and ye shall carry \w up|strong="H5927"\w* my \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* hence with you.

¶ And they took their \w journey|strong="H5265"\w* from \w Succoth|strong="H5523"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* in \w Etham|strong="H0864"\w*, in the \w edge|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them by \w day|strong="H3119"\w* in a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, to \w lead|strong="H5148"\w* them the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*; and by \w night|strong="H3915"\w* in a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, to give them \w light|strong="H0215"\w*; to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*:

He took not \w away|strong="H4185"\w* the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, nor the \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* of \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \add from\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
